NTR fans complaining about subpar story... most NTR only works because of hentai logic, because most of them require characters to be braindead except for the person stealing the lover. This one is more shit than most though, tbf.

I don't think this scenario has ever played out in real life, like ever. Rape happens irl, even gore happens withs psycho killer rapist. But never once have I've heard of a either a fatass teacher able to control a HS thot through sex and even more so unbelievable, the HS thot able to rope a total stranger into that silliness. There isn't any money involved. Dicks is a dozen in a dozen for any HS that wants it.
